Full discretion

High Qualified Health Psychologist

Dr Sumodhee is a highly qualified health psychologist and chartered Health Care Professional Counsellor. She has a wealth of experience in helping people with addictive health damaging habits. She is passionate about helping people live healthier happier lives. Dr Sumodhee has also undertaken accredited trainings and is able to provide supervision for clinical supervision or generic needs. Dayyanah offers a supportive environment to encourage reflection and offer a range of supervision models to best support you and your needs.
